DOC.brief_summary: Different study suggest early enteral nutrition ( EEN ) benefit reduce infectious complication , data address whether delayed enteral nutrition ( EN ) detrimental may effect inflammatory response immune function .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Delayed Enteral Nutrition Inflammatory Responses Immune Function Competence Critically Ill Patients With Prolonged Fasting
DOC.criteria: fast time 14 day American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status range 1 3 , condition allow enteral nutrition therapy . chronic renal failure ( peritoneal hemodialysis creatinine > 2.5 mg/dl ) history chronic obstructive pulmonary disease hepatic dysfunction cirrhosis bilirubin value > 3 mg/dl metabolic disease , severe anemia blood coagulation dysfunction pregnancy lactation history psychiatric illness patient underwent immunosuppressive therapy
